item.title: Fallen leaves creating hazards, 5th January
item.description:
Fallen and compressed leaves on pavement and in gutters along this section of Cudnall St. This is creating sludge, blocking gutters and causing slip hazards. When frozen, it's extremely slippery and last winter, a passer- by fell on the compressed leaves on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cudnall Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen leaves in gutters and on pavement, 5th January
item.description:
Fallen leaves around the tuning circle and along Cudnall St creating slippery sludge and blocked gutters
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5A, Cudnall Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree roots causing trip hazard on pavement, 5th January
item.description:
Most of this road has dangerous trip hazards from roots of trees. I have fallen and tripped many times. Also slippy in places from tree sap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Stanway Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water consistently running down this road. Now lethal as turned to ice, 4th January
item.description:
There is water constantly running down this road and has been for long time (over a few years) and nothing is ever done to sort it. There is a blocked culvert causing it. The water running down the road has turned to ice over the last few days and is now extremely dangerous. Please could this culvert be unblocked and short term the road be gritted as a priority.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Abandoned metal sign on Honeybourne path, 4th January
item.description:
Following the closure of part of the Honeybourne cycle/pedestrian path several weeks ago, the sign used has not been collected. It is on the path which crosses the bridge over Swindon Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 143, Swindon Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Six abandoned road signs on verge within 100 metres, 4th January
item.description:
Opposite the b4079 turning on the a435 and back towards teddington hands. If you come from teddington hands towards cleeve there are 6 road signs within about 100m on the left hand side just before the right turn to aschurch.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Oxenton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
